Radeon:
Forbes: 微软Surface Book 3 今年晚些时候发布，ICL+Radeon
https://www.forbes.com/sites/ewanspence/2019/06/23/microsoft-surface-book-3-windows-10-gamers-new-leak-rumor-graphics-hardware-xbox/#31f093782dd7
While Microsoft has not announced details on a follow-up Surface Book, the presumptively titled Surface Book 3 is expected to launch later this year with the next generation Ice Lake processor from Intel and graphics cards from AMD. Pair a Radeon card in a Surface Book with one of the beefier Intel chips, and you are most of the way to a machine that will suit gamers. The controller options are already there, which leaves some considerations on the screen as well as an accurate keyboard.

糟糕的魔女:
本帖最后由 糟糕的魔女 于 2019-6-26 20:34 编辑

Surface Pro/Laptop/Book的致命缺陷分别是什么？相对而言哪个缺陷不那么大？
苏菲Pro的缺点是散热，有无风扇都别指望散热给力，有风扇版长期使用还有清灰难题。另外没有type C。
sl的缺点是没有type C，接口过于复古。以及同样清灰麻烦。
sb缺点上面说了，为了兼顾平板形态用低压U，过万的价格性能也就那样，散热也不好看，对比sl又重了不少。
相对而言我选苏菲Pro i5无风扇版。虽然没有type C，但用转接线供电也可以实现一下出门用移动电源供电的愿望。无风扇不用担心清灰的问题，作为平板体验比sb强。价格上也算是这几款里性价比不错的。
—— 来自 Sony H8324, Android 9上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.1.2
